    • isEqual

      public static boolean isEqual(BigDecimal x, BigDecimal y)
      Checks if x is equal to y.
      Parameters:
      x - the BigDecimal value to check.
      y - the BigDecimal value to check.
      Returns:
      true if both x and y are equal otherwise false.
      Since:

    • isStrictInt

      public static boolean isStrictInt(String value)
      Checks if the value contains a 32 bit int. True for the following formats: -1401, 1401, 0. False for the following values/formats: +1401, 01401, 001401, 14.01, 14-01, 1401-, abcd
      Parameters:
      value - the value to check if it contains an 32 bit int value
      Returns:
      true if it contains 32 bit int value otherwise false.
      Since:
      12.0.3

    • isStrictLong

      public static boolean isStrictLong(String value)
      Checks if the value contains a 64 bit int. True for the following formats: -1401, 1401, 0. False for the following values/formats: +1401, 01401, 001401, 14.01, 14-01, 1401-, abcd
      Parameters:
      value - the value to check if it contains an 64 bit int value
      Returns:
      true if it contains 64 bit int value otherwise false.
      Since:
      12.0.4
